paper_abstract: We present a method of interactive analysis of preference ordered data that is based on Dominance-based Rough Set Approach (DRSA). The presented here methodology is conceptually similar to multi-dimensional reports (pivot tables) applied in On-Line Analytical Processing (OLAP). However, it allows to identify patterns in data that remain undiscovered by traditional approaches to multi-dimensional reporting. The main difference consists in use of specific dimensions and measures defined within DRSA. The method permits to find a set of reports that ensures specified properties of analyzed data and is optimal with respect to a given criterion. An example of reports generated for a well-known breast cancer data set is included.
paper_title: Interactive analysis of preference-ordered data using dominance-based rough set approach
